creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: off white cotton embroidered with geometric vase of flowers motif; 2 rows of 5 motifs from hem to waist; red, blue and green colors; sleeve cuffs embroidered in same colors with larger floral motif; long triangular piece of fabric with tassel descends from seam at cuff; fabric is black, yellow and red stripe, tassel blue, red and green embroidery yarn; no neck opening; embroidered on back near hem in green: eight sided geometric figure with six sided geometric figure below
title: Dress
